name: Guacamole dip
description: House-made daily with ripe avocados, fresh tomatoes, white onions, cilantro, and jalape単os. Served with warm tortilla chips and salsa verde

name: Cheese dip
description: Creamy white cheese dip melted with spicy chorizo (Mexican sausage) and poblano peppers. Perfect for sharing

name: Bean dip
description: Traditional refried pinto beans topped with melted Monterey Jack cheese and fresh pico de gallo

name: Queso fundido
description: Authentic Mexican melted cheese with spicy chorizo sausage, served bubbling hot with fresh flour tortillas

name: Fiesta fries
description: Crispy french fries loaded with bacon bits and queso blanco, topped with your choice of grilled protein and drizzled with sour cream and chipotle sauce

name: Quesadilla casa azteca
description: Large grilled flour tortilla stuffed with cheese and your choice of marinated steak, chicken, chorizo, or fresh vegetables. Served with lettuce, pico de gallo, and sour cream

name: Appetizer casa azteca
description: Perfect for sharing! Crispy taquitos, mini tostadas, jalape単o poppers, and cheese quesadilla on fresh lettuce. Served with sour cream and diced tomatoes

name: Jalape単o poppers
description: Six fresh jalape単os stuffed with creamy cheddar cheese, lightly battered and fried golden. Served on lettuce with sour cream and tomatoes

name: Wings
description: Ten crispy chicken wings tossed in your choice of sauce: classic buffalo, tangy BBQ, or spicy mango habanero. Served with celery sticks and cool ranch or blue cheese dressing

name: Street corn
description: Grilled sweet corn on the cob, Mexican street style. Slathered with chipotle mayo, cotija cheese, chili powder, and lime juice
